{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20581v1", "title": "ClonEval: An Open Voice Cloning Benchmark", "summary": "We present a novel benchmark for voice cloning text-to-speech models. The
benchmark consists of an evaluation protocol, an open-source library for
assessing the performance of voice cloning models, and an accompanying
leaderboard. The paper discusses design considerations and presents a detailed
description of the evaluation procedure. The usage of the software library is
explained, along with the organization of results on the leaderboard.", "main_category": "cs.CL", "categories": "cs.CL", "published": "2025-04-29T09:36:33Z"}
